metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3916 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description: The str_buf_cat function in string.c in Ruby 1.9.3, 2.0.0, and 2.1 allowscontext-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentationfault and crash) via a long string.

criterions.comment: ruby1.9.1: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
ruby2.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
